Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these Steve Jobs , but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said.
